entry.source: 〉 The place is almost deserted. There{F801}aren't many monks in training.{F801}{F802}〉 Where do you want to go?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The place is almost deserted. There{F801}aren't many monks in training.{F801}{F802}〉 Where do you want to go?{F801}

entry.source: To Hongwanji's main building{F801}To the hidden passage{F801}
entry.target: To Hongwanji's main building{F801}To the hidden passage{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You enter the main hall of Tsukiji{F801}Hongwanji.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You enter the main hall of Tsukiji{F801}Hongwanji.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You jump into the hole connected to{F801}the underground.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You jump into the hole connected to{F801}the underground.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You head for the hidden passage{F801}leading to the surface.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You head for the hidden passage{F801}leading to the surface.{F801}

entry.source: Enter the main hall{F801}Go underground{F801}Go to the surface{F801}
entry.target: Enter the main hall{F801}Go underground{F801}Go to the surface{F801}

entry.source: 〉 There are many monks in training here.{F801}{F802}〉 Where do you want to go?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There are many monks in training here.{F801}{F802}〉 Where do you want to go?{F801}
